title: Maksym Borovkov
text: Maksym Valeriyovych Borovkov (, born on 5 April 1977) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> and <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who plays for <a href="FSC%20Prykarpattya%20Ivano-Frankivsk">FSC Prykarpattya Ivano-Frankivsk</a> in the <a href="Ukrainian%20First%20League">Ukrainian First League</a>. He has previously played for <a href="FC%20Metalurh%20Novomoskovsk">FC Metalurh Novomoskovsk</a>, <a href="FC%20Elektrometalurh-NZF%20Nikopol">FC Elektrometalurh-NZF Nikopol</a>, <a href="FC%20Krasyliv">FC Krasyliv</a>, <a href="FC%20Podillya%20Khmelnytskyi">FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi</a>, <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Ivano-Frankivsk">Prykarpattya Ivano-Frankivsk</a> and <a href="FC%20Desna%20Chernihiv">FC Desna Chernihiv</a>.
